-Falcy Picks-
❝Today's Featured Products include our FT-340X, a revolutionary laptop which offers competitive specs for up to $400 less than mainstream brands.
We also offer 3 years of international warranty on our products, as well as two years of international warranty for our gaming peripherals,
such as the M1x Gaming mouse, featuring up to 32,000 DPI.❞

Upcoming featured Products

• • •
❝Falconium©, being a new and ambitious company, is working on many projects,
which will soon bear fruit. Including our new featured Products set to release Q1 '26.
Introducing and including, but not limited to, our new innovation, the UFX-786 Gaming Laptop. The UFX-786 Gaming laptop includes three in-built fans, 8000 MAH High-Capacity, fast-charging Battery.
The UFX-786 can comfortably stream videos for 28 Hours, and can handle five hours of intensive gaming.❞
